md:
giải nghĩa từ "showers" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Showers (noun): 
	+ Meaning: a device that sprays water, typically for washing the body.
	+ Example sentence: "The hotel room had a luxurious shower with multiple heads."
	+ Related words: bathroom, toilet, sink, bathtub
	+ Antonyms: dry, arid

* Showers (verb): 
	+ Meaning: to give someone or something a lot of attention, praise, or gifts.
	+ Example sentence: "The celebrity was showered with gifts and admiration by her fans."
	+ Related words: praise, compliment, admire, gift
	+ Antonyms: ignore, neglect

* Showers (noun): 
	+ Meaning: a brief period of rain or snow.
	+ Example sentence: "The weather forecast predicted scattered showers throughout the day."
	+ Related words: rain, snow, storm, weather
	+ Antonyms: sunshine, clear skies
html:
giải nghĩa từ "showers" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Showers (noun):

    • Meaning: a device that sprays water, typically for washing the body.
    • Example sentence: "The hotel room had a luxurious shower with multiple heads."
    • Related words: bathroom, toilet, sink, bathtub
    • Antonyms: dry, arid

  • Showers (verb):

    • Meaning: to give someone or something a lot of attention, praise, or gifts.
    • Example sentence: "The celebrity was showered with gifts and admiration by her fans."
    • Related words: praise, compliment, admire, gift
    • Antonyms: ignore, neglect

  • Showers (noun):

    • Meaning: a brief period of rain or snow.
    • Example sentence: "The weather forecast predicted scattered showers throughout the day."
    • Related words: rain, snow, storm, weather
    • Antonyms: sunshine, clear skies
